cards.title: Cassie
powers: You may discard up to 3 cards. You may move a card with an Aqua Cost of your discarded cards' total {magic} or less from the Riverbank to your hand, ignoring its Indestructable status. Draw until you have 3 cards.
setup: At the start of the game, put The Riverbank into play.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may play a card.
One hero may use a power.
One player may draw a card.

openingLines.default: And here I was hoping for a fresh start. I suppose this will do.

cards.title: Riverbank
body: At the start of the game, take all River cards in {Cassie}'s deck and shuffle them together to create the River deck. [i](This is not currently displayed due to engine restrictions.)[/i] Then, place the top 4 cards of the River deck under this card.
After a card beneath this is played or moved to somewhere other than the River deck, move the top card from the River deck beneath this until there are 4 cards beneath this.
This card and all cards beneath this card are indestructible.
This card is not a hero, villain, or environment card.

cards.title: Droplet
body: This card has an Aqua Cost of 1.
Each Hero regains 1 HP.
You may move all cards beneath Riverbank to the bottom of the River deck in the same order, ignoring their indestructable status, and put the top 4 cards from the River deck under Riverbank.

cards.title: Water Surge
body: This card has an Aqua Cost of 1.
{Cassie} deals 1 target 2 Cold Damage. {Cassie} regains 1 HP.

cards.title: Rushing Waters
body: This card has an Aqua Cost of 2.
You may play 2 cards.

cards.title: Waterlog
body: This card has an Aqua Cost of 2.
Destroy an Ongoing or Environment card.

cards.title: River-Worn Stone
powers: Move a card from your hand to the bottom of the River deck. {Cassie} deals 1 Target that card's {magic} Projectile Damage.
body: This card has an Aqua Cost of 3.
You may draw an additional card during your Draw Phase.

cards.title: Stream Shot
body: This card has an Aqua Cost of 3.
Move a card beneath Riverbank to the bottom of the River deck, ignoring its indestructable status.
{Cassie} deals 1 target that card's {magic} Cold Damage.
Put 1 card from the River deck under Riverbank.

cards.title: Condensed Orb
body: This card has an Aqua Cost of 4.
2 Targets gain 3 HP.

cards.title: Storm Swell
body: This card has an Aqua Cost of 4.
{Cassie} deals up to 2 Targets 4 Cold Damage.

cards.title: Rising Waters
body: This card has an Aqua Cost of 5.
Increase Damage dealt by Hero Targets by 1.
At the start of your turn, destroy an Ongoing card.

cards.title: Perpetual Flow
body: This card has an Aqua Cost of 6.
Discard a card.
Play a card from the Riverbank. (It is treated as your card afterward.)

cards.title: Meeting The Ocean
powers: Discard up to 3 cards. {Cassie} deals 1 target Cold Damage equal to the discards cards' total {magic}. Draw until you have 3 cards.
cards.body: This card has an Aqua Cost of 6.

unusedCards.title: Stream Surge
body: {Cassie} deals up to 3 targets 1 Projectile Damage. You may play a card.

unusedCards.title: Diverging Waters
body: Draw 3 Cards. Play a Card. Move this card to the bottom of the River deck.

unusedCards.title: Shape the Stream
body: You may move a card from the Riverbank to the top of your deck, ignoring its Indestructable status. (You do not pay any Aqua Cost.)

promoCards.title: Cassie - Essence Flow
setup: At the start of the game, put The Riverbank into play. Shuffle all of your River cards to make the River deck.
promoCards.powers: Move a card from your hand to the bottom of the River deck. Select a card under Riverbank with an Aqua Cost of up to 2 higher than the moved card and move it to your Trash. Draw until you have 3 cards.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may play a card.
One hero may use a power.
One player may draw a card.

openingLines.default: Perhaps I can manage with a little more control.
openingLines.OblivAeonFrontPageCharacter: Here's hoping I can last enough to make things happen...

dummyPromoCards.title: Cassie
setup: At the start of the game, put The Riverbank into play.
dummyPromoCards.powers: Discard up to 2 cards with {magic} of 2 or more. For each card discarded this way, move 1 card from under Riverbank to the bottom of the River deck, ignoring its indestructible status. Move the card under the Riverbank with the lowest Gain Cost to your Trash, ignoring its indestructible status.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may play a card.
One hero may use a power.
One player may draw a card.

openingLines.default: Perhaps I can manage with a little more control.
openingLines.OblivAeonFrontPageCharacter: Here's hoping I can last enough to make things happen...

dummyPromoCards.title: Cassie
dummyPromoCards.powers: Play 1 card from the Riverbank. (It is treated as your card afterward.) {Cassie} deals themselves Infernal Damage equal to the played card's Aqua Cost. Discard your hand. Draw 2 Cards.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may play a card.
One hero may use a power.
One player may draw a card.

openingLines.default: Perhaps I can manage with a little more control.
openingLines.OblivAeonFrontPageCharacter: Here's hoping I can last enough to make things happen...
